favourite.article: I always knew deep down in me There was a longing to be free A kind of hunger deep inside But now it can be satisfied
Now life affords a real reward Whenever I just call “O Lord!” The Triune God the Spirit is, And He can fill mine up with His.Love You my Lord!

This relates to me I have been waiting to be free. I was hungry for Jesus to fill my heart and now I have found the fulfilment of His words. I am so glad for His Grace and true Divine . Thank You Jesus!!!
